derivation: from G3844 (παραφέρω) and G5342 (παραφέρω) (including its alternate forms);
strongs_def: to bear along or aside, i.e. carry off (literally or figuratively); by implication, to avert
outline:
1. to bear to, bring to, put before
  2. to lead aside from the right course or path, to carry away
  3. to carry past, lead past
    1. to cause to pass by, to remove
